clients.quote: James spends quite a bit of time getting to know his clients and their projects to be able to add tremendous value to them.
clients.author: Emma Wilson

clients.quote: James is exceptionally talented and very well-versed in both design and web technologies. I highly recommend him.
clients.author: John McMillan

clients.quote: James is one of the most talented designers we've had the opportunity to work with. His elegant design execution comes with great precision.
clients.author: Kate Peters
